autoComplete.description: Helps users to fill forms faster. You can learn more about it at https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/form-control-infrastructure.html#autofill

autoFocus.description: If true, the input element will be focused during the first mount.

disabled.description: If true, the input element will be disabled.

error.description: If true, the input element will be displayed in error state.

fullWidth.description: If true, the input will take up the full width of its container.

margin.description: If dense or normal, will adjust vertical spacing of this and contained components.

multiline.description: If true, a textarea element will be rendered instead of an input.

placeholder.description: The short hint displayed in the input before the user enters a value.

required.description: If true, the label is displayed as required and the input element will be required.

rows.description: Number of rows to display when multiline option is set to true.

rowsMax.description: Maximum number of rows to display when multiline option is set to true.

type.description: Type of the input element. It should be a valid HTML5 input type.

value.description: The value of the input element, required for a controlled component.
